headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On the Test Track this Week
content:
Give the Pegassi Infernus, Truffade Adder, and the Pegassi Reaper a cursory spin between the columns of the LS Car Meet’s Test Track, see how they fare in a competitive Scramble against your peers, or floor it and race against the clock in Time Trials — all at no personal cost.

Players can spectate the Test Track inside the LS Car Meet by heading to an exit door of the Test Track and selecting Spectate Test Track.
